title: Lunglei South MLA Pu Lalramliana Papuia'n Lunglei Home TNT-ah Solar Power khawl bun thar a hawng
content:
4413/2025-2026

Lunglei, 2026 Ramtuk thla ni 11:Lunglei South bialtu MLA Pu Lalramliana Papuia chuan ni tha chakna hmanga Lunglei Home TNT chawm tura SELCO Foundation te'n Solar Power khawl an bun thar, "Fully Solar Powered Lunglei Home TNT" chu vawiin khan a hawng.

Pu Lalramliana Papuia chuan Pathian leh ram rawngbawlnaah Pathian duh zawng ngaih pawimawh hmasak a ṭul tih sawiin, TNT Home pawh Pathian duh zawng rawngbawlna hmun a nih angin an mamawh Pathianin a pe zel tih a sawi a. SELCO Foundation te hma lakna chu lawmawm a tih thu leh ropui a tih thu sawiin, chhunzawm zel turin a chah a. Mahni theihna zawn ṭheuhva mi dangte tana malsawmna nih chu mihring dam chhan leh khawvel nuam zawk a awm theih nana thil pawimawh a nih thu sawiin, ram, khawtlang leh mi dangte tana ṭangkai nih tum ṭheuh turin kal khawmte a chah.

Lunglei Home TNT Secretary Pu C. Lalbiaknunga'n inlawmna thu a sawi a. SELCO Foundation State Lead Pu Lalnuntluanga Colney chuan technical report pein, TNT-a Solar Power an bun chu 5KW a nih thu leh a bunna senso ₹80,000/- a nih thu a sawi.

Lunglei Home TNT Director Pu Lalramnghinglova chuan an mamawh solar power an nei thei ta chu lawmawm an tih thu sawiin, bialtu MLA, SELCO Foundation leh anmahni duhsaka ṭanpui ṭhintute chungah lawm thu a sawi a. Mi 768 awmna TNT Lunglei chuan kawlphetha an mamawhna a san thu sawiin, solar power bun thar chu chhum lo chat lovin, ṭangkai takin an hmang tih a sawi.

Fully Solar Powered Lunglei Home TNT hawnnaah hian MLA Pu Lalramliana Papuia hi Lunglei Municipal Council (LMC) Executive Councillor Pu Zorinsanga Hmar, Ward No. X Councillor Pi Judy Lalhriatpuii leh political party hruaitute'n an ṭawiawm.

Lalzuala, Sr. SDO in Technical report a pek bakah ‘Meri Panchayat App’ hman dan hrilhfiahna a nei nghal a ni. title: LEIMIN TUR HRIAT THEIHNA ATANA WARNING PE CHHUAK THEI KHAWL EARLY LANDSLIDE REALTIME MONITORING SYSTEM
content:
4411/2025-2026

Aizawl, 11th February, 2026 :Vawiin khan DM&R Minister Prof. Lalnilawma hmaah Leimin tur hriatlawk theihna atana Warning pe chhuak thei (Early Landslide Realtime Monitoring System) khawl prototype demonstration neih a ni. He khawl hmang hian leimin mai theite a hriat zung zung theih dawn bakah Controling Center-ah leh a bul hnaia mite hnenah warning a pe chhuak thei tura beisei a ni.

He khawl hian rang takin 0.5 seconds lek chhungin realtime data cloud ah a thawn anga, chu chuan warning system a hmantutecontrol center ah a pe dawn a ni. Lei min thlen theitu (factor) hrang hrang atangin sensors transducer hman a ni a; information data base a keng tel nghal a, webservice bakah, direct realtime alert phone call leh sms a thawn nghal thei bawk a ni ( multiple user hnenah). Hei bakah hian point to point communication protocol hmangin internet leh mobile data a down pawhin sensor reading leh alert a la thawn chhuak zel thei bawk a ni. He device hian solar panel, leh grid supply a hmang kawp thei a, remote area ah pawh awlsam taka install theih a ni.

DM&R Minister Prof. Lalnilawma hi Pu Udit Prakash Rai, IAS, Commissioner & Secretary leh Pu Chuauhnuna, Director, DM&R ten an tawiawm a ni.

Prototype Demonstration petute chu -

Prof. Laldinpuia (Department of Disaster Management, MZU), Dr. Morrel VL. Nunsanga (Department of Information Technology, MZU), Dr. Reginald H. Vanlalchaka (Department of Electronics, Government Zirtiri Residential Science College), Er. Lalngaihzuala te an ni.

title: SUB-DIVISIONAL MAGISTRATE KOLASIB LEH YOUTH FOR KOLASIB (JAC) HRUAITUTE INKAWM
content:
4410/2025-2026

Kolasib, the 11th February, 2026:Vawiin chawhma dar 11:00 khan Pu H. Lalramliana MCS, Sub-Divisional Magistrate, Kolasib chuan a pisa-ah Youth for Kolasib kaihhruaina hnuaia din Joint Action Committee (JAC) hruaitute ko-in, Kolasib khawchhung kawngpui siam mek leh hmalak dan tur chungchang a sawipui.

Pu H. Lalramliana, SDM chuan JAC ten NHIDCL Office hual an tum nia Social Media atanga hriat a nih thu leh, hetiang zawnga hmalakna hian boruak thalo zawk a thlen palh a hlauhthawnawm thu a sawi a. NHIDCL leh kawng siamtu Contractor-te rikrap leh ti thlabar zawnga chetna chuan kawng siam hna a tih thuanawp theih zawk avangin an thil tum chu kaltlangpui lo turin a ngen a ni.

SDM chuan Contractor-ten an hna zo fel tur hian July ni 7, 2026 thleng hun an neih thu tarlangin, hetih lai hian mi thenkhatin High Court lamah thlenin hma an lak avangin Contractor-te hian April ni 30, 2026-ah chuan an hna an zawh hman tur thu Affidavit hmangin an thehlut nia hriat a nih thu a sawi a. He thil hi High Court chuan a thlir reng thu leh hnathawkte hmasawn dan pawh a en zui reng thu a sawi bawk. Hetiang hi thil awmdan a nih avangin, tuna hnathawktute hna ti bahlah thei leh mipui nunphung pangngai ti buai thei boruak siam lo turin Pu H. Lalramliana chuan JAC hruaitute chu a ngen a ni.

He hunah hian Youth for Kolasib (JAC) hruaitute chuan NHIDCL leh a hnuaia Sub-Contractor ten an hna an thawk chak tawk lo leh mipuiten harsatna namen lo an tuar mek chu pawi an tih thu an sawi a. Hemi chungchanga an lungawilohna lantir nan February ni 16, 2026 (Thawhtanni) hian Diakkawn YMA Hall atanga tanin College Venga NHIDCL Office pan a, Office hual tura ruahmanna an siam thu an tarlang a. An lungawilohna chungchang thu hi Ministry of Road Transport and Highways (MoRTH) leh Mizoram Governor hnenah thehluh an tum thu an sawi bawk.

Inkawmkhawmna ah hian Addl. Superintendent of Police, Sub-Deputy Commissioner, NHIDCL Office awmna College Veng khawtlang hruaitute leh YMA hruaitute pawhin JAC te hmalak tum dan chu boruak thalo thlen palh theihna a nih avangin, ruahmanna him zawk leh tha zawk kawng dang dap turin JAC hruaitute hi a ngen bawk a ni.

Vawiin thutkhawmah hian Sub-Divisional Magistrate, Kolasib hi Pu K. Laltluangliana, Addl. SP leh Pu Lalthanzuala, SDC ten an tawiawm a. Pu Andrew Vanlalauva, VCP College Veng leh Pu Andrew Lalrintlinga, Secretary YMA College Veng te leh Youth for Kolasib (JAC) hruaitute an tel a ni.

title: Serchhip District Magistrate-in Ui khuahkhirhna thupek chhuah
content:
4407/2025-2026

Dated Serchhip, the 11th February, 2026:India ram chhung leh Mizoram chhungah faina leh hriselna lama hma kan sawn theihna turin sawrkar-in chak takin hmalakna a kalpui mek zel a, Serchhip Districtah pawh theihtawpa hmalakna kalpui a ni bawk a ni. Hetih lai hian ui khuahkhirh lova khawlaia chhuah tir thin hian khawtlang faina, himna leh hriselna a nghawng theih bakah khawtlang hmasawnna leh changkanna daltu a ni thei a. Pu Paul L. Khuma, District Magistrate, Serchhip District chuan Section 163 of Bharatiya Nagarik Suraksha Sanhita, 2023 tlawh chhanin a hnuaia thupek hi a chhuah a ni.

1. Mi tumahin midangte tana harsatna siam zawng leh midangte tana hnawksakin ui an vulh tur a ni lo.

2. Ui vulh tuten khawlaiah an ui te an chhuah zalen tur a ni lova, khawlaia an chhuahpui dawnin hrui/chain rinawm tha taka hlingin an kai ngei tur a ni.

3. Ui vulh tuten an an ui vulh te tha takin an khuahkhirh tur a ni.

4. Ui khawlaia tla leh a nghawnga hrui/chain-a thlunna awm lo te chu neitu awm lo anga ngaih a ni ang.

5. Ui vulh tuten an ui vulhte zun leh ek khawlaiah an hnutchhiah tur a ni lo.

He thupek hian thu leh awm hma chu Order chhuah ni 9 February, 2026 atanga thla 2 (two months) chhung a huam ang.

He thupek zawm lo chu Section 223 of Bharatiya Nyaya Sanhita, 2023 dan hmangin hrem theih an ni ang.

title: PMEGP Awareness Program conducted at Govt. Saitual College
content:
4406/2025-2026

Saitual, the 11th February, 2026:A PMEGP (Prime Minister’s Employment Generation Programme) Awareness Program was successfully conducted at the Government Saitual College, Saitual, Mizoram to educate students and faculty members about entrepreneurship opportunities and government support for self-employment.

The session was led by Mr. Safiyan Hayath, Executive, and Ms. Lalthapuii, Marketing Expert, who shared valuable insights on entrepreneurship, business development, and the benefits of the PMEGP scheme.

Mr. Safiyan Hayath explained the objectives of PMEGP, highlighting how the scheme supports aspiring entrepreneurs with financial assistance and government subsidies to start manufacturing and service-based enterprises. He emphasized the importance of self-employment and encouraged students to shift their mindset from job seekers to job creators.

Ms. Lalthapuii, Marketing Expert, spoke about the importance of marketing strategies in building a successful business. She guided students on understanding market demand, branding, customer engagement, and the role of digital marketing in today’s competitive environment. Her session provided practical knowledge on how young entrepreneurs can sustain and grow their ventures.

The program aimed to create awareness about government schemes, inspire entrepreneurial thinking among students, and motivate them to explore self-employment opportunities after completing their education.

The session was interactive and informative, with students actively participating and showing interest in entrepreneurship initiatives. The program concluded with encouragement for students to utilize government schemes like PMEGP to build a secure and independent future.

title: HORTICULTURE MINISTER PU C. LALSAWIVUNGA’N KOLASIB DISTRICT CHHUNGA DEPARTMENT HMALAKNA HRANG HRANG A TLAWH
content:
4405/2025-2026

Kolasib, February 11, 2026:Vawiin khan Horticulture, AH & Vety etc. Minister Pu C. Lalsawivunga chuan Kolasib District chhunga Horticulture Department hmalakna hrang hrangte a tlawh.

Minister hian chawhma lamah Centre of Excellence (CoE), Thingdawl tlawhin, helai hmuna Horticulture hotuten an hmalakna hrang hrangte lo entirin hun an hmang a.

CoE-ah hian Horticulture thiamna hmanga Tomato leh Strawberry chin dan te, pangang hmanga leitha siamna (Vermicompost) te, leitha atana bawng an vulh te leh pangpar an khawih dante Minister hi an lo entir a, hmalakna hrang hrangte uluk taka enfiahin zawhna awm ang angte Pi PC.Lalnghahsangi, Project Officer leh thawktuten an chhang a ni.

Centre of Excellence for Horticulture, Thingdawl hi 2013 a din ani a, 2015 ah hawn a ni. He centre in a tum ber chu quality planting material kuthnathawktute hnena sem chhuah a ni a.Nikum planting season ah khan Avocado, Dragonfruit, Papaya, M.Orange tiak te sem chhuah a ni. Nikum vekah khan a vawikhat nan curcuma pangpar variety hrang hrangte commercial a hralh chhuah a ni.Tin, Banakaih Research wing hnuaiah sawhthing semi-intensive leh terrrace cultivation hmanga enchhin a ni bawk. Brimato (Brinjal leh tomato) grafting hmanga hlawhtling taka zawm niin, a rah pawh a tha hle. Tun dinhmunah hian strawberry, tomato, Chinese cabbage, mau(rawthing) tiak te an nei mek a ni. He centre ah hian thlai te hi pesticide tello veka enkawl a ni a.Tin he centre in a tum ber chu one time use plastics hman loh hram a ni.

Horticulture Minister hian CoE Thingdawl bakah hian Pu Lalnunpuia, DHO Kolasib hovin Darnam Zau, Kawnpui-a balhla chinna hmun a tlawh a, kuthnathawktute hmalakna leh harsatnate a enpui a. Hei bakah hian Block Horticulture Office, Thingdawl leh Ginger Collection Centre, Thingdawl te a tlawh nghal bawk. Chawhnu lamah Pu Lalfamkima, Deputy Speaker Mizoram Legislative Assembly hovin Improvement of Link Road, Project Veng to Tuichhuahen Zau-a hmalakna te a enpui leh a, District Horticulture Office-ah officers leh staff te nen hun an hmang zui a ni.

Vawiina Horticulture hmunhma hrang hrang a en na ah Minister Pu C. Lalsawivunga chuan Department hmalakna hrang hrang a hmuh te chu tha a tih thu sawiin, thawktute leh inpekna a fakawm hle a ni, a ti . Kolasib District chu leilung hausakna leh thlai thar chhuah kawngah theihna sang tak nei a ni tiin, tun aia nasaa tan la thar turin a chah nghal bawk. Minister chuan Sorkar pawhin kuthnathawktute hmasawnna tur leh thar chhuah tih pun kawngah a tul ang angah hma a la zel dawn a ni, a ti.

Kolasib District Horticulture Office chanchin leh hmalakna tlangpui te hi lo tarlang tel nghal i la:

Kolasib District-ah hian Horticulture Department office hi hun eng emaw chen atang khan kalpui tawh niin, Divisional Horticulture Office-ah dt. 1.8.2003 khan hlankai a ni a. Hmasawnna hmu in bung thar a kai zel a, Divisional Office hi District Office-ah dt. 19.11.2020 khan hlankai leh a ni. Tun dinhmunah District Horticulture Office, Kolasib District hnuaiah hian Block Horticulture Office pahnih - Bilkhawthlir Block & Thingdawl Block a awm a. Officer leh Staff, a nghet leh casual te nen an hna an thawk mek a ni.

Tun dinhmuna hmalakna langsar zualte pawh tarlang ila:

Collection Centre & Chowkidar Quarters: NABARD Warehouse Infrastructure Fund atangin Bilkhawthlir, Kharzawlah Rs 68.5 lakh hmangin kum 2026 atanga hmalak tan a ni.

Improvement of Link Road: Project Veng to Tuichhuahen Zau-ah SASCI 2024-2025 hnuaiah Rs 1.8 Crore hmanga hmalak mek a ni.

Water Tank: Pre-Fabricated Collapsible Water Tank under MIDH 2024-2025 (1st & 2nd Installment) hnuaiah District chhung hmun hrang hranga install turin Unit 50 ruahman a ni.

Drip & Sprinkler System: RKVY-PDMC hnuaiah Kolasib District hmun hrang hrangah Drip leh Sprinkler install turin Unit 85 ruahman a ni a, hmalak mek a ni.

Cultivation of fruits and vegetables: Kolasib district chhung a khaw hrang hrangah thei leh thlai chin tur sem chhuah thin niin, a enkawl dan turah training pek thin a ni bawk.

Banana Ripening Chamber: Kawnpui Bangla Vengah Banana Ripening Chamber bun turin proposal submit a ni.

Vawiina Minister hun hman na hi Pu Lalfamkima , Deputy Speaker Mizoram Legislative Assembly; Pu CH. Lalmuanpuia, Director, Horticulture Department; Pu Manthanga Tochhawng, Deputy Director, Horticulture Department; Pu Vanlaltlana Zote, PS to Minister leh Kolasiba Horticulture Department Office leh Staff ten an tawiawm a ni.

title: MARA ṬHALAITE KÛT PAWIMAWH TÂK O DÔH KU HMAN A NI
content:
4404/2025-2026

Dated Siaha, February 11, 2026:Vawiin chawhnu dár 1:00PM khân Model Youth Association, Multipurpose Hall, New Siahaah Mara ṭhalaite intihhlimna kut O Dôh Ku hman a ni a, Pu S. Lalremthanga, Deputy CEM, MADC chuan khual lian niin a hmanpui a, Pu D.R. Lalropuia, IBES, Director (E) & Cluster head chu Khual zahawm a ni.

Thu sawiin khual lian chuan Mara ṭhalaite kut pawimawh tâk, mi nawlpuiin kan hriat lâr tawh loh O Dô Ku hman a ni chu lawmawm a tiin, ṭhalaite pual bîk atân he kut hi hman ṭhîn a ni, a ti. Hmanlai kan pi leh pute chu tlangram lo neia eizawng an ni a, Buh leh thlai an seng zawh awllen laiin nula leh tlangvalte chuan an khuaa mi awmthei deuhte in chu an hual a, 'Pi bêr kan lo lut dâwn e, kawngkhar min lo hawn rawh,' tiin an ko a. Chhungkua an inrawnkhawm hnuah, Pi bêr chuan a kaa tui hmuam ṭeuh chungin kawngka a hawng a, ṭhalaite chu a phuh deuh ṭhawt ṭhawt a, lawm takin an inah a luhtir a; zankhuain zu leh sâ nên hlim takin an zai a, an lam a, nuam titakin an hmang ṭhin. Kar tin in tinah an insawn zêl a, ṭhalaite dawlzo thei tur chhungkua an thlang chhuak ṭhin. Chutiang chhungkua chu an khuate pawhin an ngaisang em em a, ṭhalaite hlim nân insenso an hreh ṭhin lo hi an entawn tlak hle a ni, a ti.

Hnam tihdan leh rohlute vawnhim zel a ṭul thu leh chutiang kawngah chuan Akashvani in pawimawhna an neih thu Pu S. Lalremsanga chuan sawiin, Kan pi leh pute kut leh nunmawi tâk kan sakhuanin a phal chin hnuaiah inmil taka hman chhoh a nita hi thil ropui leh chhinchhiahtlak tâk a ni. Mara fate ngei pawhin kan hriat tawh mang loh kut pawimawh tâk huaihawt nachang Akashvani Community Radio Service-in inhria hi lawmthu ka hrilh che u a. Hnam tlêm leh hnufual zawkte khawvel mipui hriata min phochhuaktu langsar tâk pakhat innih avângin Mara mipuite pawh hian inchungah lawmthu sawi tur kan ba nasa hlein ka hria, a ti. Hnam läm leh rohlute hi chawisang a, ngaihlu a, vawnhim a, thiam tum ṭheuh turin ṭhalai leh school naupang kal khawmte a chah bawk.

Khual zahawm Pu DR. Lalropuia chuan Hnam lam leh ṭawng humhalh a ṭul thu sawiin, chumi atân chuan tlawmngai pawl leh akashvani a thawktu ten mawhphurhna nasa tâk kan nei a, a dik thei ang bêra thil kalpui a ṭul a ni a ti. Ram hmasawn (developed country) apiang an dam rei thu leh, Mizo mipuite kan damrei lo hi veiawm a tih thu kual zahawm hian sawiin chawhrualin mipa kum 66 leh hmeichhia kum 81 chauh kan dam a, hriselna lam kan ngaih pawimawh deuh deuh a ṭul a ni, a ti. Akashvani Community Radio Service Siaha pawh thuamṭhat chhoh zel tum niin tunah hian facebook leh youtube kaltlangin live-a pekchhuah a ni a, rawtna emaw sawiselna emaw nei kan awm anih chuan engtik lai pawhin a thawktute hnenah thlen theih reng anih thu a sawi bawk.

O Dôh Ku hi Akashvani Community Radio Service, Siaha buatsaih niin Mizoram hmun hrang hranga Akashvani thawktuten an hmanpui bakah Siaha khawpui chhunga Mara Thyutlia Py (MTP) Branch hrang hrang te'n hnam lam chi hrang hrang an entîr a, malzai ngaihnawm tak tak ngaihthlak a ni a, Maraland Academy School te a bîk taka sàwm an ni bawk. Nl. Anu Deshyaley Hlychho-in lawmthu sawina a nei a, kut hman a ṭiak a ni.

title: NATIONAL SUMMIT 2026, NEW DELHI-A NEIHAH HEALTH MINISTER PI LALRINPUII’N ‘WOMEN ICON AWARD 2026’  A DAWNG
content:
4398/2025-2026

Dated Aizawl, 11th February 2026:Vawiin khan Achievers’ World leh Indian Achiever Forum-te tangkawpin an buatsaih ‘National Summit 2026 - Vikshit Bharat 2047 through Comprehensive Socio-Economic Development’, Le’ Meridien Hotel, New Delhi-a neihah Health & Family Welfare leh Social Welfare, Women & Child Development Minister ni bawk Pi Lalrinpuii chuan chawimawina ‘Women Icon Award 2026’ a dawng. He hunah hian Shri Harsh Malhotra, Union Minister of State, Ministry of Corporate Affairs, Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India chu khuallian niin, Pi Lalrinpuii chu khualzahawm a ni.

National Summit 2026, New Delhi-a neihah hian Minister Pi Lalrinpuii chuan thu sawiin, Mizoram tana a hnathawh avanga chawimawina an pekah lawmthu a sawi a, he award a dawn theihna chhan chu mimal hmalakna ni loin, Department officials fel tak takte nena theihtawpa ram leh hnam tana an thawh hona vang a nih thu a sawi a. Mizoram chu India rama CSR fund hmu tlem ber a nih avangin, a bikin central sawrkar-in a ngaih pawimawh em em, Health & Nutrition sector-a thawh ho puiah, he hun hmanga kalkhawm, Corporate lam hotute chu a sawm zui nghal bawk a ni.

India-in Kum 2047-ah Developed Country a nih theihna tur atana hmalakna - Mission Viksit Bharat huang chhunga tehfung pawimawh tak pakhat Healthcare sector-ah Mizoram Health Department chu an thawh that em avang te, Mizoram Universal Health Care System (MUHCS) tha tak, mi tin ban phak buatsaih a nih avang te, thingtlang mite’n zangkhai zawk leh awlsam zawka ruang an phurh theihna tura Social Walfare-in mipui tan a ruahman avang te, kum kalta chhunga Mizoram chu India ram state hrang hrang zinga kum khat hnuailam thi zat (Infant Mortality Rate) hniam berna pawl an nih theih avang te, Mizoram Health Systems Strengthening Project (MHSSP) kaltlanga Damdawi In hrang hrangte thawm that an ni leh sawrkar Damdawi In tam takte’n Damdawi In tha (quality) tehna NQAS certificate dawng theia an inhlankai avangtein he award hi Health Minister Pi Lalrinpuii hnenah hian hlan a ni.

He hunah hian Pi Lalrinpuii bakah kawng hrang hranga mi hlawhtlingte leh entawn tlak tak tak thlan chhuahte hnenah chawimawina hlan an ni a. Sponspor-tu TATA, SBI, Bharat Petroleum, THDC, Canara Bank, Indian Oil ten CSR kaltlanga an hnathawh hrang hrangte tarlanna hun an hmang bawk.

Health Minister Pi Lalrinpuii hi a pasal Rev. Dr. K Sapthanga bakah Pi K. Lalrinzuali, Commissioner & Secretary, H&FW Department; Pu Lalramchuanzela, Member MYC leh Dr. Lily Chhakchhuak MD, NHM ten an tawiawm a ni.

title: AR RAM CHHUAHSANAH VANAPA HALL CHANGKANG TAK SAK A NI DAWN A, HARI MANDIR SAWN A NI DAWN
content:
4397/2025-2026

Aizawl, the 11th February 2026:Vawiin khan Assam Rifle ram chhuahsan hman dan tur ngaihtuah tura din pawl hrang hrang aiawh Advisory Committee te chu an Chairman Pu Lalduhoma, Chief Minister hovin CM Conference Hall-ah an thukhawm a. Hei hi an thutkhawm tum ngana a ni.

A thurel langsarte chu:

1. November ni 18, 2025 a an thutkhawm vawi linaa an lo rel tawh, "AR ram chhuahsan hmunhma leh building hman dilna lam reng reng committee-ah chhawpchhuah tawh loh ni se" tih chu kenkawh zel tur a ni.

2. Canteen Kuala Hari Mandir sawn nan Loch House leh CHAN Office inkarah ram pek a ni dawn.

3. Loch House chu a lan dan ti danglam lova chei that an rel a. A lo hlut zual theih nan hman tangkai dan ngaihtuah tur a ni.

4. Vanapa Hall hi a upat tawh avangin Assam Rifle-te insawn hma khan sorkar chuan sak that a tum thu a lo puang tawh a. Nimahsela, Assam Rifle an insawn takah chuan Vanapa Hall lian zawk leh changkang zawk sakna tur hmunhma a lo awm ta a. Chuvangin, Advisory Committee hian Convention Centre sak an lo pawm fel tawh chu Vanapa Hall hming puttir an rel a. Tuna Vanapa Hall hi chu sorkarin a hmanna tur a ngaihtuah dawn a ni.

5. Chief Minister Pu Lalduhoma hian Khatlaa AR ram mawng lam, MINECO bul hnai hi Chief Minister Residence leh CM Office sak nan a dil thin a. CM Office leh Secretariat Building inhlat taka a awm hian sorkar meeting leh programme tam tak hi a kal tluang lo fova. Hun, tha leh sum sen a sang bawk a. MINECO lama CM hmunhma sawn mai hi heng harsatna pumpelhna tha bera ngaih a ni. Tin, Khatlaa AR ram Joint Survey chuan ram chuang (surplus) hi Hectare khat chuang hlek a awm tih a lo hmuchhuak tawh a.

Tun thla February ni 2, 2026 a Chief Minister leh Lt. Gen Vikas Lakhera, DG, AR te inkawmnaah Khatlaa Assam Rifles ram thenkhat, Tuikual veng ep ram, MINECO Main Entrance ep atanga awlsam taka pawh phei theih chu sorkar hnena an hlan theih tur thu Chief Minister a hrilh a. Chak taka bawhzui mek a ni.

6. Aizawl laili laia War Memorial pahnih Canteen kual leh Treasury Square-a mite hi Assam Rifles lam ten Khatlaa an ram chhunga sawn an tum thu tarlan a ni.

7. AR chhuahsan ram china kawngpui tihzauh leh siamthatna tur sum sanction hi tun hnaiah hmuh a ni a. PWD lam ten hna an tan thei thuai dawn nia tarlan a ni.

8. Invitees member Association for Environmental Preservation (ASEP) chuan AR ram chhuahsan ram zau zawk (52.57%) a nihna anga humhalh tura ruahmanna siam a nih avangin Advisory Committee chungah lawmthu an sawi.

9. AR rama thingphuna, ramngaw nuam tak lo siamtu Bethlehem YMA hnenah te, phal taka an ram sorkara hlan lettute hnenah te Advisory Committee chuan lawmthu a sawi nawn a. Committee hminga lawmthu sawina lehkha siam an remti a ni.

Heng bakah hian thil pawimawh dang an sawiho bawk.

Chief Minister hian lungrual taka ram hman dan tur an relho thin avangin Advisory Committee member-te chungah lawmthu a sawi a ni.

Meetingah hian Pu K. Sapdanga, Home Minister, Pu B. Lalchhanzova, Revenue Minister, Pu Lalnghinglova Hmar, SYS Minister bakah Advisory member dangte an tel a ni.

Nimin vek khan Pi Lalrinpuii leh Asian Development Bank, a Country Director - Pu Mio Oka te chuan ADB India Residence Mission Office, Delhi ah inkawmna an nei a. Tun hnaia Asian Development Bank in Mizoram Sawrkar Flagship Programme - Universal Health Care Scheme kalpuina atana Externally Aided Loan pek an rawn remtih chungchangah thawhhona tha neih chhohzel theih dan tur kawng te sawi tlang in, tihtur hmachhawp hrang hrangte an sawi ho a. Lawngtlai Deputy Commissioner, Shri Donny Lalruatsanga, attended the programme as Chief Guest, while Smt Jothansangi Tlau, Chief Judicial Magistrate (CJM), graced the occasion as Guest of Honour.

In his welcome address, Shri Donny Lalruatsanga expressed his gratitude to all participants. He stated that knowledge of laws and legal procedures is essential for good governance, and especially important for government officials. Ignorance of the law, he said, cannot be an excuse, and therefore officials must make every effort to understand relevant legal provisions. He encouraged the participants not only to equip themselves with legal knowledge but also to guide and educate others. Emphasizing that governance cannot function without adherence to laws, he urged officials to sincerely undergo training and properly implement laws and rules. Although many laws exist, he highlighted that the topics selected for the day’s training were particularly significant and wished the participants a productive session.

Guest of Honour Smt Jothansangi, CJM, stressed that studying the law is both important and necessary, especially as new laws continue to be enacted. She pointed out that India is governed by the rule of law and that awareness of legal provisions is the responsibility of every citizen. She noted that lack of legal knowledge can lead to serious difficulties and emphasized the need to understand key and relevant laws. She encouraged government officials to enhance their legal awareness and actively participate in the training.

Shri F. Lalremmawia, Deputy Director, ATI, stated that the “Special Awareness Campaign on Legal Provisions” would be conducted in various districts and urged participants to make the best use of the training.

During the programme, resource persons delivered sessions on selected topics. Smt Jothansangi, CJM, spoke on “Alternate Dispute Redressal/Legal Services” and “Social Media Ethics.” Shri C. Lalbiakkima, Government Advocate, delivered a session on “Writ Petitions, Appeals, Contempt Cases and Parawise Comments. Shri C. Lalremsanga, Civil Judge-cum-JMFC, presented on “Child Laws: POCSO Act & JJ Acts” and “General Principles / Legal Maxims and Doctrines in Law.”

The programme was chaired by Smt  Margaret J. Vanlalremmawii, SDO (S). A large number of government officials from Lawngtlai attended the campaign, and the session concluded with an engaging question-and-answer discussion.

title: LAWNGTLAIAH NIKHAT AWH 'SPECIAL AWARENESS CAMPAIGN ON LEGAL PROVISIONS' NEI
content:
4391/2025-2026

Lawngtlai, 11th February 2026:Vawiin khan Administrative Training Institute (ATI) leh Mizoram State Legal Services Authority tangkawp buatsaihin Lawngtlaia Sawrkar hnathawkte tan ' Special Awareness Campaign on Legal Provisions' DC Conference Hall- ah neih a ni a. Lawngtlai Bawrhsap Pu Donny Lalruatsanga chuan khuallian nia hmanpuiin, Pi Jothansangi Tlau, Chief Judicial Magistrate (CJM) chu khualzahawm a ni.

Pu Donny Lalruatsanga chuan kalkhawmte hnena lawmthu sawina a nei hmasa a. Dan leh dun hriat chu khua leh tui tha nihna a ni a, a bik takin sawrkar hnathawkte tan a tul zual em em a ni, a ti. Dan hriatloh hi thil pawi tak a ni a, hriatloh hi thiam channa a nih loh avangin a tam thei ang bera dan hriat chu sawrkar hnathawkte tan a pawimawh hle tih a sawi . Dan hriat ang angte pudarhtu leh midangte zirtirtu ni theuh turin kalkhawmte a chah a. Bawrhsap chuan dan tel lovin sawrkar a kal thei lo tih tarlangin tha taka dan leh thupek kengkawh tura tha taka training turin sawrkar hnathawkte a chah a ni. Dan tam tak awm mahse, vawiin training naa thupui thlan chhuah chu a pawimawh zual tih tarlangin, hlawk taka hun hmang turin kalkhawmte duhsakna a hlan nghal a ni.

Khualzahawm Pi Jothansangi, CJM, chuan dan zir chu thil pawimawh leh tul tak a nih bakah dan thar a lo chhuah reng avangin mahni inennawn fo a tul hle a ti a. India ramah dan a lal ber tih tarlangin, dan hriat chu mi tin tihmakmawh a nih thu a sawi. A bik takin dan hriatloh avanga harsatna tawh theih a nih thu sawiin, dan pawimawh bik te hriat ngei ngei a tul hle a ni, a ti. Sawrkar hnathawkte chu an hnathawh kawngah dan pawimawhna hre thar tura chahin, tha taka training - nei turin a ngen nghal bawk.

Pu F. Lalremmawia, Deputy Director, ATI chuan 'Special Awareness Campaign on Legal Provisions' chu District hrang hranga kalpui tur a nih thu sawiin, training - tha taka nei turin kalkhawmte a sawm a ni.

Vawiin hun hmannaah hian thupui thlan bik hmangin zirhona neih a ni a. Pi Jothansangi, CJM chuan 'Alternate Dispute Redressal/Legal Services ' leh 'Social Media Ethics' tih thupui hmangin zirtirna a pe a, Pu C. Lalbiakkima, Govt. Advocate chuan ' Writ Petitions, Appeals, Contempt Cases and Parawise Comments' tih hmangin zirtirna a pe a. Pu C. Lalremsanga, Civil Judge cum JMFC chuan ' Child Laws: POCSO Act & JJ Acts' leh ' General Principles / Legal Maxims, Doctrines in law ' tih thupui hmangin zirtirna a pe bawk a ni.

Vawiin hun hmanna hi Pi Margaret J. Vanlalremmawii SDO (S) chuan kaihruaiin Lawngtlaia Sawrkar hnathawkte an tel kim tha hle a, zawhna leh chhanna hun tha tak hman a ni.
